mapper.select: /* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.admin.billMng.repository.SystemBillMapper.selectBillDetail */ select emd.seq , emd.bill_id , emd.cls_cd , emd.rmrk_kg , emd.rmrk_ru , emd.mtn_dt , emd.prsd_rjct_dt , emd.lgl_rvw_rslt_code , emd.lgl_act_rslt_code , emd.rslt_dt , emd.reg_id , emd.reg_dt , emd.mod_id , emd.mod_dt from kgst.ebs_master_detail emd where emd.bill_id = #{billId} and emd.cls_cd = #{clsCd}

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.admin.billMng.repository.SystemBillMapper.selectBillFile */ SELECT max(seq) as seq , max(bill_id) as bill_id , max(file_kind_cd) as file_kind_cd , max(cls_cd) as cls_cd , max(org_file_id) as org_file_id , max(org_file_nm) as org_file_nm , max(pdf_file_id) as pdf_file_id , max(pdf_file_nm) as pdf_file_nm , max(rmk) as rmk , max(opb_yn) as opb_yn , max(delete_yn) as delete_yn , max(file_size) as file_size , max(reg_id) as reg_id , max(reg_dt) as reg_dt , max(mod_id) as mod_id , max(mod_dt) as mod_dt FROM kgst.ebs_file WHERE delete_yn = 'N' and bill_id = #{billId} group by file_kind_cd, cls_cd

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.admin.billMng.repository.SystemBillMapper.selectBillMtngList */ select emc.bill_id -- 안건아이디 , emc.cmt_cd -- 위원회코드 , ema.mtng_id -- 회의아이디 , em.due_dtm -- 회의예정일시 , ema.rslt_cd -- 회의결과코드 , em.dgr_cd -- 회의차수 from kgst.ebs_master_cmt emc left join kgst.ebs_mtng_agenda ema on ema.bill_id = emc.bill_id left join kgst.ebs_mtng em on em.mtng_id = ema.mtng_id where emc.bill_id = #{billId} and em.mtng_type_cd = '1' and emc.cmt_se_cd = 'M' order by dgr_cd

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.admin.billMng.repository.SystemBillMapper.selectMtngFile */ select emf.mtng_id , emf.org_file_id , emf.org_file_nm , emf.pdf_file_id , emf.pdf_file_nm from kgst.ebs_master_cmt emc left join kgst.ebs_mtng_agenda ema on ema.bill_id = emc.bill_id left join kgst.ebs_mtng_file emf on emf.mtng_id = ema.mtng_id where emc.bill_id = #{billId} and emf.delete_yn = 'N'
